titleStmt.title: A School for princes, or, Political reflections upon three conspiracies preceding the death of Alexander the Great translated out of French by A.O.
titleStmt.author: A. O.

notesStmt.note: Translation of an unidentified work in French.
Preliminary pages are cropped in the filmed copy. Signature A3-25 photographed from Yale University copy and inserted at the end.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
